scripts.dev: concurrently "cd ./server && npm run dev" "cd ./client && npm run dev"
scripts.start: npm run build && cd server && npm start
scripts.build: npm run build:client && npm run build:server
scripts.build:client: cd client && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:server: cd server && npm install && npm run build
scripts.deploy: zip -r app.zip . && az webapp deploy --resource-group PredictionSurvey --name yalepredictionsurvey --src-path ./app.zip --type zip --async true
